---
title: "SIRB model with planktons and phages"
output: html_notebook
---

where the total number of human population is $N = S+ I +R$

Without half-saturation

$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dS}{dt} &= b N - \delta S - \beta V S + \omega R \\
\frac{dI}{dt} &= \beta V S - (\gamma + \delta_I + \delta)I \\
\frac{dR}{dt} &= \gamma I - (\omega + \delta) R \\
\frac{dV}{dt} &= \sigma I + \rho Z_V - c \lambda V Z_F - \mu V P - \delta_V V \\
\frac{dP}{dt} &= \tau \mu VP - \delta_P P\\
\frac{dZ_F}{dt} &= \eta \alpha P (Z_F + Z_V) - \lambda V Z_F - \delta_Z Z_F\\
\frac{dZ_V}{dt} &= \lambda V Z_F - \delta_Z Z_V\\
\frac{dX}{dt} &= r X (1 - \frac{X}{K}) - \alpha X (Z_V + Z_F)\\ 
\end{aligned}
$$


| Parameter | Description  | Dimensions | Estimate  | Reference |
|:---------:|:---------------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------:|:-----:|:-: 
$b$         | Natural birth/immigration rate of human                  | day^-1^                         | $6.85 \times 10 ^{-5}$ | XX
$\delta$    | Natural death/migration rate of human                    | day^-1^                         | $3.8 \times 10 ^{-5}$  | XX
$\beta$     | Transmission rate via bacteria                           | day^-1^                         | $0.0214$ | XX
$\omega$    | Rate of immunity loss of recovered individuals           | day^-1^                         | $0.00092$ | XX
$\gamma$    | Recovery rate of infected human                          | day^-1^                         | $0.2$  | XX
$\delta_I$  | Induced death rate caused by infection                   | day^-1^                         | $0.013$ | XX
$\sigma$    | Bacterial shedding rate by infected human                | cells L^-1^ day^-1^ per person  | $10$-$10^{-4}$ | XX 
$\rho$      | Bacterial shedding rate by infected zooplankton          | cells L^-1^ day^-1^ per mg      | XX | XX 
$c$         | Colonization efficient of bacteria in zooplankton        | cells (mg) L ^-1^               | $5 \times 10^{-7}$ | XX
$\lambda$   | Encounter rate of Vibrio and zooplankton                 | day^-1^                         | $0.005$ - $0.1$ | XX
$\mu$       | Encounter rate of Vibrio and phage                       | day^-1^                         | XX | XX
$\delta_B$  | Death/washout rate of bacterial in the reservoir         | day^-1^                         | $0.33$ | XX
$\tau$      | Conversion coefficient from Vibrio to phage              | Virions per cell                | $80$ - $100$ | XX
$\delta_P$  | Phage decay rate                                         | Virions per day                 | $0.5$-$7.9$ | XX
$\eta$      | Conversion coefficient from phytoplankton to zooplankton | NA                              | $0.6$ | XX
$\alpha$    | Predation rate of zooplankton and phytoplankton          | day^-1^                         | $0.4$ | XX
$\delta_Z$  | Death rate of zooplankton                                | day^-1^                         | $0.06$ | XX
$r$         | Phytoplankton intrinsic growth rate                      | day^-1^                         | $0.5$ | XX
$K$         | Phytoplankton carrying capacity                          | mg L ^-1^                       | $1$ | XX




$h_Z$ | Half-saturation rate constant of bacterial-zooplankton association | cells L^-1^ | $10^9$  | XX
$h_B$ | Half-saturation rate constant of bacterial transmission | cells L^-1^ | $10^9$  | XX
$h_P$ | Half-saturation rate constant of zooplankton and phytoplankton encountering | cells (mg) L ^-1^ | $0.5$  | XX





With half-saturation

$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dS}{dt} &= \delta_b N - \delta_d S - \beta  \frac{B_F S}{h_B + B_F} \\
\frac{dI}{dt} &= \beta \frac{B_F S}{h_B + B_F} - (\gamma + \mu + \delta_d)I \\
\frac{dR}{dt} &= \gamma I - \delta_d R\\
\frac{dB_F}{dt} &= \lambda I + c \sigma_Z \frac{B_F Z}{h_Z + Z} - c \sigma_Z \frac{B_F Z}{h_Z + Z} - \tau \sigma_H B_F H - d_B B_F \\
\frac{dB_Z}{dt} &= c \sigma_Z \frac{B_F Z}{h_Z + Z} - \sigma_H B_Z H - d_BB_Z\\
\frac{dZ}{dt} &= \sigma_Z \frac{B_Z Z} {h_Z + Z} + c_{Z} \alpha \frac{P Z}{h_P + P} \\
\frac{dP}{dt} &= r_P P (1 - \frac{P}{K}) - \alpha \frac{P Z}{h_P + P}\\ 
\frac{dH}{dt} &= (\tau B_F + B_Z)c_{H} \sigma_H H - \omega H\\
\end{aligned}
$$
